resources.string: Created by Evan Rettman and Ryan Murphy
Below is a list of explanations for the different tasks.
Here you can find the scores for each game played.
To "Whop It!", tap your phone screen.
To "Twist It!", rotate your phone longways.
To "Shake It!", move the phone back and forth rapidly.
Each time you get it correct, you get a point! Be careful though, take too long and the game will be over!
